title: 21: S6E21 – "Cut and Dried" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you three spine-chilling tales from authors Dan Weatherer, William Dalphin, and Matt Dymerski, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about illicit intentions, cryptic containers, and malevolent myths.  

                         
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
